Question: On January 8, 1868, this person first published the women's rights weekly journal The Revolution.
Hints: In 1849, at age 29, this person quit teaching and moved to the family farm in Rochester, New York.
In the summer of 1852, this person met both Greeley and Stone in Seneca Falls.
Her birthday on February 15, is commemorated as this person Day in the U.S.
